## [6th Place] Reproduce the training result (kiccho's part)
- In this Notebook, I will train my models.
- The solution detail is described in @kurupical's [post](https://www.kaggle.com/c/shopee-product-matching/discussion/238010)
- For the coding details, please refer to my [github repository](https://github.com/kiccho1101/kaggle-shopee-6th-place-solution)
- I set config.train_config_epochs=1 in this Notebook for the time saving, but in the actual submission I used trained models with epochs=10
